problem_text:
Does there exist an irreducible 5′-subgroup G of GL(V ) for some finite F5-space V such that the number of conjugacy classes of the semidirect product V G is equal to |V| but G is not cyclic?
Such a subgroup exists if 5 is replaced by p = 2, 3 but does not exist for primes p > 5 (J. Group Theory, 14 (2011), 175–199).
P. Schmid
